title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the limits

2 points are earned for the integrands

1 point is earned for the answer

The graphs of y = f(x) and y = g(x) intersect in the first quadrant at the points (0, 2), (2, 4), and

(A, B) = (1.032832, 2.401108).

Area= ∫ 0 A [ g(x)−f(x) ]dx + ∫ A 2 [ f(x)−g(x) ]dx         =0.997427+1.006919=2.004 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@72E4@

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for considering h'

1 point is earned for the answer

h(x) = f(x) – g(x)

h'(x) = f'(x) – g'(x)

h'(1.8) = f'(1.8) – g'(1.8) = –3.812 (or –3.811)
